item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Tuesday, October 22, 2024 at 3:15 PM UTC
item.description:
1. Show HN: Rust Web Framework (73 points | 26 comments)
2. Tog's Paradox (84 points | 40 comments)

29. Overengineering a way to know if people are in my university's CS lab (172 points | 79 comments)
30. Singapore OKs 4,300km subsea cable for importing electricity from Australia (89 points | 99 comments)
